S03n257:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasmin vanapradeśe nānāvidharāgaruciracitrapatraḥ śatapatro babhūva |
S03n257:5: bālaiḥ pravālaiḥ sa mahīruhāṇāṃ puṣpādhivāsairmadhubhiśca hyadyaiḥ |
S03n257:7: dharmaṃ parebhyaḥ pravadan yathārhamārtān yathāśakti samuddharaṃśca |
S03n257:9: iti paripālyamānastena mahāsattvena tasmin vanapradeśe sattvakāyaḥ sācāryaka iva bandhumāniva savidya iva rājanvāniva sukhamabhyavardhata |
S03n257:11: sa sattvakāyo'pi tathaiva tena saṃrakṣyamāṇo guṇavṛddhimāpa ||3 ||
S03n257:12: atha kadācitsa mahāsattvaḥ sattvānukampayā vanāntarāṇi samanuvicaraṃstīvravedanābhibhavādviceṣṭamānaṃ digdhaviddhamivānyatamasmin vanapradeśe reṇusaṃparkavyākulamalinake sarasaṭaṃ sihaṃ dadarśa |
S03n257:13: samabhigamya cainaṃ karuṇayā paricodyamānaḥ papraccha-kimidaṃ mṛgarāja ?
S03n257:16: kṛtaṃ tavāsvāsthyamidaṃ śrameṇa vyādheṣuṇā vā rujayā kayācit ||4 ||
S03n257:17: tad brūhi vācyaṃ mayi cedidaṃ te yadeva vā kṛtyamihocyatāṃ tat |
S03n257:18: mamāsti yā mitragatā ca śaktistatsādhyasaukhyasya bhavān sukhī ca ||5 ||
S03n257:19: siṃha uvāca-sādho pakṣivara ! na me śramajātamidamasvāsthyaṃ rujayā vyādheṣuṇā vā |
S03n257:20: idaṃ tvasthiśakalaṃ galāntare vilagnaṃ śalyamiva māṃ bhṛśaṃ dunoti |
S03n257:25: atha bodhisattvaḥ paṭuvijñānatvādvicintya śalyoddharaṇopāyaṃ tadvacanaviṣkambhapramāṇaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya taṃ siṃhamuvāca-yā te śaktistayā samyak tāvatsvamukhaṃ nirvyādehīti |
S03n257:27: atha bodhisattvastadasya kāṣṭhaṃ dantapālyorantare samyagniveśya praviśya cāsya galamūlaṃ tattiryagavasthitimasthiśakalaṃ vadanāgreṇābhihṛtyaikasmin pradeśe samutpāditaśaithilyamitarasmin parigṛhya paryante vicakarṣa |
S03n257:31: uddhṛtya śalyena sahaiva tasya duḥkhaṃ ca tatsaṃjanitāṃ śucaṃ ca |
S03n257:34: prasādhya saukhyaṃ vyasanaṃ nivartya vā sahāpi duḥkhena parasya sajjanaḥ |
S03n257:35: upaiti tāṃ prītiviśeṣasaṃpadaṃ na yāṃ svasaukhyeṣu sukhāgateṣvapi ||8 ||
S03n257:36: iti sa mahāsattvastasya tadduḥkhamupaśamayya prītahṛdayastamāmantrya siṃhaṃ pratinanditastena yatheṣṭaṃ jagāma |
S03n257:37: atha sa kadācitpravitataruciracitrapatraḥ śatapatraḥ paribhraman kiṃcitkvacit tadvidhamāhārajātamanāsādya kṣudagniparigatatanustameva siṃhamacirahastasya hariṇataruṇasya māṃsamupabhuñjānaṃ tadrudhirānurañjitavadananakharakesarāgraṃ saṃdhyāprabhāsamālabdhaṃ śaranmeghavicchedamiva dadarśa |
S03n257:38: kṛtopakāro'pi tu na prasehe vaktuṃ sa yācñāvirasākṣaraṃ tam |
S03n257:40: kāryānurodhāttu tathāpi tasya cakṣuṣpathe hrīvidhuraṃ cacāra |
S03n257:41: sa cānupaśyannapi taṃ durātmā nimantraṇāmapyakaronna tasya ||10 ||
S03n257:42: śilātale bījamiva prakīrṇaṃ hutaṃ ca śāntoṣmaṇi bhasmapuñje |
S03n257:43: samaprakāraṃ phalayogakāle kṛtaṃ kṛtaghne vidule ca puṣpam ||11 ||
S03n257:44: atha bodhisattvo nūnamayaṃ māṃ na pratyabhijānīta iti nirviśaṅkataraḥ samabhigamyainamarthivṛttyā prayuktayuktāśīrvādaḥ saṃvibhāgamayācata-
S03n257:47: ityāśīrvādamadhuramapyucyamāno'tha siṃhaḥ krauryamātsaryaparicayādanucitāryavṛttiḥ kopāgnidīptayātipiṅgalayā didhakṣanniva vivartitayā dṛṣṭyā bodhisattvamīkṣamāṇa uvāca-mā tavadbhoḥ |
S03n257:48: dayāklaibyaṃ na yo veda khādana visphurato mṛgān |
S03n257:49: praviśya tasya me vaktraṃ yajjīvasi na tadbahu ||13 ||
S03n257:51: jīvitena nu khinno'si paraṃ lokaṃ didṛkṣase ||14 ||
S03n257:52: atha bodhisattvastena tasya rūkṣākṣarakrameṇa pratyākhyānavacasā samupajātavrīḍastatraiva nabhaḥ samutpapāta |
S03n257:54: athānyatamā vanadevatā tasya tamasatkāramasahamānā dhairyaprayāmajijñāsayā vā samutpatya taṃ mahāsattvamuvāca-pakṣivara,
S03n257:62: atha bodhisattvastathāpyasatkāraviprakṛtaḥ protsāhyamāno'pi tayā vanadevatayā svāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ pradarśayannuvāca-alamalamanena krameṇa |
S03n257:64: ārte pravṛttiḥ sādhūnāṃ kṛpayā na tu lipsayā |
S03n257:65: tāmavaitu paro mā vā tatra kopasya ko vidhiḥ ||16 ||
S03n257:66: vañcanā sā ca tasyaiva yanna vetti kṛtaṃ paraḥ |
S03n257:67: ko hi pratyupakārārthī tasya bhūyaḥ kariṣyati ||17 ||
S03n257:72: upakṛtaṃ kila vetti na me parastadapakāramiti prakaroti yaḥ |
S03n257:73: nanu viśodhya guṇaiḥ sa yaśastanuṃ dviradavṛttimabhipratipadyate ||20 ||
S03n257:74: na vetti cedupakṛtamāturaḥ paro na yokṣyate'pi sa guṇakāntayā śriyā |
S03n257:75: sacetasaḥ punaratha ko bhavetkramaḥ samucchritaṃ pramathitumātmano yaśaḥ ||21 ||
S03n257:79: atha sā devatā tatsubhāṣitaprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhviti punaruktamabhipraśasya tattatpriyamuvāca-
S03n257:81: na veṣamātraṃ hi munitvasiddhaye guṇairupetastviha tattvato muniḥ ||23 ||
S03n257:83: tadevaṃ protsāhyamāno'pi sādhurnālaṃ pāpe pravartitumanabhyāsāditi sajjanapraśaṃsāyāṃ vācyam |
S03n257:86: evaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabahulāḥ svāṃ guṇaśobhāmanurakṣanti paṇḍitā iti pratisaṃkhyānavarṇe vācyam |
S03n257:87: tathāgatamāhātmye ca bhadraprakṛtyabhyāsavarṇe ca-evaṃ bhadraprakṛtirabhyastā tiryaggatānāmapi na nivartata iti |
